(duration in days)
{{(line.SupplyDurationDays || 0) * preload.methods.getItemCategoryProperty(line.ProductCategoryId, 'UnitQuantityMultiplier')}} {{preload.methods.getItemCategoryProperty(line.ProductCategoryId, 'UnitQuantityUnitOfMeasureAbbreviation')}} (Unit Quantity)
(ingredient)
(item)

Why is there no multi-Facility create such as that available in Employees, Strains, and Locations?

Certain Item Categories require the selection of a pre-existing Strain. Verifying and informing that the specified Strain exists
in all of the selected Facilities would be convoluted and complex to inform. For this reason we have opted to not add the ability
to create Items in multiple Facilities at the same time.
